body.p:
Grayson Carter Co Ky
Nov 28th 1861
His Excellency B Magoffin
Dear Sir
I hereby most Respectfully Tender to you to you My Resignation as Colonel of of the Enrolled Militia of Carter County to take effect from and after the first day of January next

Most Respectfully your
Obt Servt
J R Roth Col
Carter Co Militia
Accepted
B. Magoffin
